data.name: Frigus İnferos
data.detailed_description:
Unfortunately due to technical problems we were not able to publish the game in the first specified date. We’re still struggling with the problems. We are really sorry to make everyone wait. We have to delay the publish until we fix all technical problems, but we will publish the game as soon as possible. We’re really sorry to those who have been waiting for the release for a long time. With respect

"Something that shouldn't be happened, the person who shouldn't die died"

Hell has been calm for thousands of years. Until he comes....

A child opened his eyes in hell abruptly. He couldn't remember who he was or where he came from. He had to find his memories and figure out what he was doing there. To do this, however, he had to visit the seven gates of hell and had to overcome tasks assigned to him in there without questioning.

So, what would you do if you opened your eyes in hell. Would you choose to escape or accept?

A relentless adventure awaits you...

Features
The game completely English language support.
Are you ready for small but difficult traps to be given to you in hell?
The game can work in any system.
The enormous story of the game will make you feel emotions from emotions.

data.short_description: Are you ready for a child's hell? Courage or run away?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
